ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Disciplines?
ygData.msgSnippet: I know they are for melee classes. I think you have to buy books from a merchant of your class to get disciplines. I think there might be AA ones as well. I
ygData.messageBody:
I know they are for melee classes. I think you have to buy books from a merchant of your class to get disciplines. I think there might be AA ones as well. I don't play melee class so I don't know. Maybe a monk, rogue, or warrior could shed some more light.
Sorry I can't be of more help.
luv,
-Su

======== At 2004-10-13, 15:12:00 you wrote: ========


I was looking at writeups on http://eq.crgaming.com/ and came across
a thing called Disciplines. But I have not discovered how to use
these. Is this old info? If not how do I get the Disciplines?

Robert
